summary: Found 3 issues in express checkout endpoint.

findings.title: Missing idempotency key on payment charge
findings.description: Charge creation does not set an idempotency key, risking duplicate charges on retries.
findings.memory_reference: All payment handlers must include an idempotency key
findings.suggested_fix: Pass an idempotency key derived from request id into charge creation.

findings.title: Retry loop lacks exponential backoff
findings.description: Retry logic uses immediate retries without backoff and jitter.
findings.memory_reference: Retry logic must use exponential backoff with jitter
findings.suggested_fix: Use an exponential delay with random jitter before each retry.

findings.title: Error message is not actionable
findings.description: The thrown error message 'failed' has no context for debugging or support.
findings.memory_reference: Error messages must be actionable and include context
findings.suggested_fix: Include payment intent id and failure reason in the message.

memory_suggestions.content:
- NEVER log request bodies or raw user input in payment handlers
- PII (card numbers, SSN, email) must be redacted before any logging
memory_suggestions.rationale: The current memory does not enforce data-handling rules for logging sensitive request payloads.
